# mbuf_pkthdr_setlen

**Function**

## Declaration

```swift
void mbuf_pkthdr_setlen(mbuf_t mbuf, size_t len);
```

## Parameters

- **mbuf**: The mbuf containing the packet header.
- **len**: The new length of the packet.

## Discussion

Sets the length of the packet in the packet header.
title: mbuf_pkthdr_setlen
